thread.section_title: Video: Philippe Coutinho scores stunning goal for Brazil vs Paraguay – Metro
thread.title: Video: Philippe Coutinho scores stunning goal for Brazil vs Paraguay
thread.title_full: Video: Philippe Coutinho scores stunning goal for Brazil vs Paraguay

author: Chris Davie
title: Video: Philippe Coutinho scores stunning goal for Brazil vs Paraguay
text:
Philippe Coutinho scored a stunning strike for Brazil. (AFP/Getty Images) Philippe Coutinho scored a stunning goal to put Brazil in front against Uruguay on Tuesday evening.
The midfielder has been criticised for his form at Liverpool since returning from an ankle injury at the start of the year.
But the 24-year-old showed absolutely no signs of rustiness with a superb low finish from the edge of the area in the 34th minute of Brazil’s World Cup qualifier.
Barcelona have been linked with a move for Coutinho this summer , and on this evidence, it’s not hard to see why…
Coutinho Goal vs Paraguay from 4 different angles…. pic.twitter.com/bkmY80VkMm 
— LFCMostar (@LFCMostar) March 29, 2017
